app.name: Trogdor Beta
app.long_description:
A recreation of the Homestar Runner Flash game "Trogdor" made with SDL. Currently in beta. In-game button prompts are for Wii Remote, but a Gamecube controller also works.
https://github.com/Mips96/Trogdor-Reburninated
Trogdor is originally created and owned by the Brothers Chaps, and programmed by Jonathan Howe; credits are listed in-game.
